The photo appeared on Facebook on Decemb: 2019, with a caption stating "Chinese flag thanks Ozil".
Mesut Ozil: a German footballer who plays for Arsenal Football Club, has condemned China's crackdown on Uighur Muslims and criticized Muslim countries for their silence on the issue on his social media accounts.
A reverse image search on Google reveale: s official Instagram account on October 7, 2019, with no Chinese flag present in the photo.
